definitions: in a way that gives out warmth; with comfortable heat
shortDefinitions: in way that gives out warmth

definitions: using clothes or coverings that help the body to retain heat
shortDefinitions: using clothes that help body retain heat

definitions: in a way that shows friendliness toward a person or enthusiasm for an idea or project

examples.text: they were greeted warmly by the locals

shortDefinitions: in way that shows friendliness or enthusiasm

definitions: with colors containing red, yellow, or orange tones
shortDefinitions: with colours containing red, yellow, or orange tones
